Package net.royalur.builder

Class GameBuilder.StandardGameBuilder

java.lang.Object
net.royalur.builder.GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<Roll,GameBuilder.StandardGameBuilder>
net.royalur.builder.GameBuilder.StandardGameBuilder
Enclosing class:
GameBuilder
public static class GameBuilder.StandardGameBuilder extends GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<Roll,GameBuilder.StandardGameBuilder>
A builder for constructing games that follow the standard rules, with dice that produce standard rolls of type Roll.

  • Field Summary

    • StandardGameBuilder

      public StandardGameBuilder(@Nonnull BoardShape boardShape, @Nonnull PathPair paths, int startingPieceCount)
      Instantiates a builder to build games following a standard rule set.
      Parameters:
      boardShape - The shape of the board.
      paths - The paths that each player must take around the board.
      startingPieceCount - The number of pieces that each player starts with.

    • dice

      @Nonnull public <R extends Roll> GameBuilder.StandardWithDiceGameBuilder<R> dice(@Nonnull Dice<R> dice)
      Description copied from class: GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder

    • buildRules

      @Nonnull public RuleSet<StandardPiece,PlayerState,Roll> buildRules()
      Description copied from class: GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder
      Generates a standard rule set to match the settings in this builder. The rules do not contain any player identification information set in this builder.
      Specified by:
      buildRules in class GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<Roll,GameBuilder.StandardGameBuilder>
      Returns:
      A standard rule set to match the settings in this builder.
